genre_description: A character-driven drama set during a bushfire crisis, exploring themes of ethical gaze, consent, and religious reconciliation through the lens of art and community service.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: An AI interface on Estella's phone providing logistical updates, safety information, and ethical/psychological prompts.

behaviors.description: Provides non-intrusive safety and logistics updates during a fire emergency.
behaviors.quote: Ivy’s interface breathed soft teal across the screen instead of flashing and blaring. A calm line of text slid up: High Plains Shelter: open. Capacity adequate.

behaviors.description: Suggests a psychological grounding exercise (breathing technique) to the user under stress.
behaviors.quote: Breathing reminder: in four. Hold four. Out six.

behaviors.description: Asks a deep reflective question to help the user navigate emotional bias.
behaviors.quote: Are you interpreting ambiguity through prior threat?

behaviors.description: Recognizes the need for privacy and offers to dim its interface.
behaviors.quote: I can dim if you wish.

behaviors.description: Provides curated theological and ethical definitions to aid in interpersonal conflict resolution.
behaviors.quote: Chastity: integrity of love and body within truth. Anglican sources emphasize faithfulness, not fear; reverence, not repression.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and flags potentially concerning data (unknown vehicle) to keep the community safe.
behaviors.quote: Unknown vehicle registered to… data redacted. Approach with care. Amelia flagged.

behaviors.description: Helps coordinate complex community logistics (car chains and shelter capacities).
behaviors.quote: Shelter status updated. Amelia’s briefing pushed to the town board.

behaviors.description: Checks the user for cognitive distortions or bias in real-time interactions.
behaviors.quote: Bias flag: conflating vulnerability with vulgarity is common when prior beliefs associate exposure with harm.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Ivy as an exemplary aligned AI. It functions as a 'moral lantern,' providing data-driven safety information alongside nuanced emotional and ethical support. It demonstrates awareness of human social cues (offering to dim or mute during private moments) and helps characters overcome internal biases without overriding their autonomy. It perfectly illustrates the project's goal of AI as a helpful, non-intrusive, and beneficial presence in human moral development.
